name: 吳昭正
objective:
學習 C 語言的用法，包括：變數、表示式、敘述、形態宣告、 控制結構、函式、陣列、指標、結構、檔案處理、及格式化輸出 / 輸入等用法，以作業及期末專題強化學習效果。
Learn C programming, including: usage of variable, expression, statement, type declaration, control structure, function, array, pointer, structure, file processing, and formatted I/O. In this course, assignments and term projects will be emphasized to strengthen the learning.
schedule:
Week 1(9/10). Introduction 
Week 2(9/17). Holiday
Week 3(9/24). Basics
Week 4(10/1). Selection and Repetition
Week 5(10/8). Variables and Arrays
Week 6(10/15). Functions
Week 7(10/22). Algorithms and Recursion 
Week 8(10/29). Time Complexity and Graph Theory
Week 9(11/5). Midterm Exam
Week 10(11/12). Leave for a conference
Week 11(11/19). Pointer
Week 12(11/26). C Strings
Week 13(12/3). Self-defined data types in C
Week 14(12/10). Classes
Week 15(12/17). Opertator Overloading
Week 16(12/24). C++ Strings, file IO, and header files
Week 17(12/31). Inheritance and Polymorphism、Templates and exception handling
Week 18(1/7). Final Exam
